acceptance-test-run.title: Invoking Podam on a POJO with both circular and non circular constructors (e.g. javax.activation.DataHandler) should lead to a non empty POJO
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandlePojosWithAMixOfCircularAndNonCircularConstructors

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class javax.activation.DataHandler
Then the Object should not be null
